errors.InvalidOperationException: An error occurred on the server side. Please check the data and try again.
errors.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.

stores.invalidIdAndStatus: Status ID and status name are invalid.

connection.invalidUsernameOrPassword: Invalid username or password. Validate connection data.
connection.invalidRoles: User does not have all necessary roles.
connection.credentialsDoNotExist: Api credential details do not exist.
connection.testKeyChanged: Test api key has been changed.
connection.liveKeyChanged: Live api key has been changed.
connection.testMerchantIdChanged: Test merchant id has been changed.
connection.liveMerchantIdChanged: Live merchant id has been changed.
connection.companyLevelKey: Api key is not merchant level.

countries.noCountries: Your store does not have any of the supported SeQura selling countries currently active. In order to process payments with SeQura payment methods please make sure to have at least one supported country in your store. For more information, please contact SeQura support.
countries.empty: Country configuration parameter cannot be an empty string.
countries.countryCode: Invalid country code in the country configuration.

payments.requiredFieldsError: Method id and code fields are required.
payments.notConfigured: Payment method with id %s is not configured
payments.failedToRetrieveMethodssequra: Failed to retrieve payment methods from sequra.

generalSettings.captureDelayError: Capture delay number of days must be between 1 and 7.
generalSettings.retentionPeriodError: Minimum number of retention period is 60.

sidebar.stepOneDescription: Your integration is ready for connection.

validation.invalidIPAddress: This field must contain only valid IP addresses.
validation.invalidJSON: This field must be a valid JSON.
validation.invalidEmail: This field must be a valid email.
validation.maxLength: The field cannot have more than %s characters.
validation.numeric: Value must be a valid number with max two decimals.
validation.nonNegative: Field cannot have a negative value.
validation.invalidUrl: Field must be a valid URL.
validation.invalidImageType: Please provide a file in one of the supported image types (PNG, JPG, SVG).
validation.invalidImageSize: The selected file exceeds the limit of 10MB.

description.onboarding: Make sure you're logged in the merchant portal because you need to copy several settings from there to fill in the following information. If you dont have an account, contact us

username.label: Username
username.description: You can find your username in the email sent by SeQura.

password.label: Password
password.description: You can find your password in the email sent by SeQura.

description.text: I want to contribute SeQura products by sending statistical data

modal.title: Change the environment?
modal.message: Are you sure you want to change the environment? This will remove all configured settings on the current environment, and reconnect you to the newly selected environment.

disconnect.title: Disconnect
disconnect.message: Are you sure you want to disconnect?

countries.title: Selling countries
countries.description: Please select countries where you want to offer SeQura payment methods.

selector.label: In which countries do you want to offer SeQura payment methods?
selector.description: Please select countries where SeQura payment methods should be available. To enable additional selling countries, please contact us here.

ES.label: Spain
ES.description: Please enter SeQura merchant ID that should be used for Spanish customers.

FR.label: France
FR.description: Please enter SeQura merchant ID that should be used for French customers.

CO.label: Columbia
CO.description: Please enter SeQura merchant ID that should be used for Columbian customers.

IT.label: Italy
IT.description: Please enter SeQura merchant ID that should be used for Italian customers.

PT.label: Portugal
PT.description: Please enter SeQura merchant ID that should be used for Portuguese customers.

PE.label: Peru
PE.description: Please enter SeQura merchant ID that should be used for Peruvian customers.

widgets.description: Promotional components allows you to display promotional widgets and educational pop-ups that shows and explains which SeQura products the shopper offers and how they work, which will help the shop increase average order value and conversion rates.

usePromotionalComponents.label: Would you like to use promotional components?

displayOnProductPage.label: Display widget on product page
displayOnProductPage.description: Specify whether payment method icon should be displayed to customers on the checkout.

showInProductListing.label: Show installment amount in product listing
showInProductListing.description: Display installment amount on product listing page

showInCartPage.label: Show installment amount in cart page
showInCartPage.description: Display installment amount for current cart amount on cart page

productPriceSelector.label: Price selector
productPriceSelector.description: Define a CSS selector to retrieve the product price

altProductPriceSelector.label: Alternative price selector
altProductPriceSelector.description: An alternative CSS selector to retrieve the product price for special product page layouts. Ex: variable products

altProductPriceTriggerSelector.label: Selector for alternative price detection
altProductPriceTriggerSelector.description: A CSS selector that points an element that, when present, indicates that the alternative price selector should be used

defaultProductLocationSelector.label: Default widget location selector
defaultProductLocationSelector.description: CSS selector to define the default container element for the widget

locations.headerDescription: Define alternative configuration per payment method
locations.leaveEmptyToUseDefault: Leave empty to use default value

cartPriceSelector.label: Cart price selector
cartPriceSelector.description: Define a CSS selector to retrieve the cart total price

cartLocationSelector.label: Cart widget location selector
cartLocationSelector.description: CSS selector to define the container element for the cart widget

widgetOnCartPage.label: Select payment method
widgetOnCartPage.description: Choose which payment method you want to display as widget on the cart page

listingPriceSelector.label: Product listing price selector
listingPriceSelector.description: Define a CSS selector to retrieve the product price in the listing

listingLocationSelector.label: Product listing widget location selector
listingLocationSelector.description: CSS selector to define the container element for the product listing widget

widgetOnListingPage.label: Select payment method
widgetOnListingPage.description: Choose which payment method you want to display as mini-widget on the product listing page

paid.label: Paid
paid.description: When a payment has status Paid.

inReview.label: In review
inReview.description: When a payment has status In review.

cancelled.label: Cancelled
cancelled.description: When a payment has status Cancelled.

informCancellations.label: Inform cancellations to SeQura
informCancellations.description: When cancelling an order paid in {{shopName}}, you will try to cancel order in SeQura.

showCheckoutAsHostedPage.label: Show SeQura checkout as hosted page
showCheckoutAsHostedPage.description: Specify whether SeQura checkout should be displayed as hosted page or popup.

sendOrderReports.label: Send orders reports periodically to SeQura
sendOrderReports.description: Specify whether integration should send periodic orders reports to SeQura system.

allowedIPAddresses.label: Allowed IP addresses
allowedIPAddresses.description: Define which IP addresses will be able to see SeQura services (i.e. only users whose IPs are in this field will be able to use SeQura).

excludedCategories.label: Excluded categories
excludedCategories.description: The store categories in this field will not be allowed to be purchased with SeQura payment methods.

excludedProducts.label: Excluded products
excludedProducts.description: The store products in this field will not be allowed to be purchased with SeQura payment methods. Please enter a valid SKU for every product you would like to exclude.
